English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite Photo Gallery Portable is a program which allows you to easily create albums from your image files, in a user-friendly environment.
Since installation is not necessary, you can store SSuite Photo Gallery Portable on a removable device (like a USB flash drive), plug into any computer and directly run its executable file. But the most important fact is that your Windows registry keys will remain intact.
The interface of SSuite Photo Gallery Portable is simplistic and intuitive. You can create a new album by specifying its name and description, as well as edit the existing ones.
Images files (in the JPG or BMP format) can be imported into album by using the file browser. Batch selection is permitted through the "Open File" dialog box. You can view, rotate and copy pictures, write comments and edit their filenames, as well as move images and play a slideshow after setting the duration of each picture on the screen.
Features Available in SSuite Photo Gallery:
- Print individual images - Export images separately - Move images to different albums - Insert bitmaps or jpegs of any size - Tag images with custom comments - View images in an image slide show - Create unlimited albums for image storage - Rotate function to correct upside down images - Export images as a single file {slide show}, viewable in any current web browser.
